about:
QikPDF : PDF File Management

• 100% local browser processing
• No uploads, no servers involved
• No file storage
• No tracking
• Fast, private and secure

All operations are performed directly on your device. Your files never leave your browser environment.

tools.pdfInfo:
View detailed information about a PDF file.
• File size and page count
• Page dimensions (A4, A5, custom sizes)
• Metadata preview
• Clean structured overview

Quickly inspect your document before editing or exporting.
tools.metadata:
View and manage PDF metadata.
• Title
• Author
• Subject
• Keywords
• Document properties

Inspect embedded document information in a clean and readable format.
tools.imageToPdf:
Create a PDF document from images.
• Reorder images before export
• Preview images during edit mode
• Maintain original image quality
• Choose page size during export

Convert multiple images into a clean, organized PDF file.
tools.pdfToImages:
Extract images from PDF pages.
• View all pages in edit mode
• Search pages by number
• Select specific pages to export
• Rename output files before processing

Extract only the pages you need as high-quality images.
tools.merge:
Combine multiple PDF files into one document.
• Reorder files before processing
• Preview individual files in edit mode
• Maintain original document quality
• Export as a single organized PDF

Merge documents in the exact order you choose.
tools.split:
Split a PDF into separate files.
• Extract all pages automatically
• Or define custom page ranges
• Rename each output file
• Preview first and last pages in edit mode

Create multiple documents from one source file with full control.
tools.rotate:
Rotate PDF pages instantly.
• 90° clockwise
• 90° counter-clockwise
• 180° rotation
• Rotation preserved during export

Apply rotation cleanly without affecting document quality.
